languages.text: "Его Светлость счел, что возможность продемонстрировать строптивый характер для него важнее, чем забота об интересах Простора. Обременительная глупость. Но, по моей информации, он все равно влез в противостояние с ксеносами, и я предпочел отложить репрессии... ненадолго".

traits.locale_text: "Его Светлость счел, что возможность продемонстрировать строптивый характер для него важнее, чем забота об интересах Простора. Обременительная глупость. Но, по моей информации, он все равно влез в противостояние с ксеносами, и я предпочел отложить репрессии... ненадолго".

languages.text: "His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined my efforts against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."
languages.original_text: "Его Светлость счел, что возможность продемонстрировать строптивый характер для него важнее, чем забота об интересах Простора. Обременительная глупость. Но, по моей информации, он все равно влез в противостояние с ксеносами, и я предпочел отложить репрессии... ненадолго".

traits.locale_text: "His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined the resistance against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

"His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined the resistance against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

"His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined the resistance against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

"His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined my efforts against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

languages.text: “那位大人认为，比起维护科罗努斯扩区的利益，炫耀他顽固的做派更加重要。他的愚蠢实在给我添了太多麻烦。不过据我的线人所言，即便像他这样的人，也依然加入了抵抗异形的行列。因此，我决定不再对他进行制裁……暂时而已。”
languages.original_text: "His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined my efforts against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

traits.locale_text: “那位大人认为，比起维护科罗努斯扩区的利益，炫耀他顽固的做派更加重要。他的愚蠢实在给我添了太多麻烦。不过据我的线人所言，即便他是个这样的人，他也依然加入了抵抗异形的行列。因此，我决定不再对他进行制裁……暂时而已。”

languages.text: «Milord consideró más importante demostrar su testarudez que proteger los intereses de la Extensión. La clase de estulticia que más trabajo ocasiona. Sin embargo, mis fuentes informan de que a pesar de todo colabora en mis esfuerzos contra los xenos, por lo que he decidido anular las sanciones... por el momento».
languages.original_text: "His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined my efforts against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

traits.locale_text: «Milord consideró más importante demostrar su testarudez que proteger los intereses de la Extensión. La clase de estulticia que más trabajo ocasiona. Sin embargo, mis fuentes informan de que a pesar de todo colabora en la resistencia contra los xenos, por lo que he decidido anular las sanciones... por el momento».

languages.text: 「ウィンタースケール陛下は、エクスパンスの利益を守るよりも己の頑固さを示す方が重要だと判断していた。愚かさほど厄介なものは無い。だが情報筋によれば、反抗しながらも異種族に抵抗する努力に加わったそうだ。奴への認可は保留することにした…当面はな」
languages.original_text: "His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined my efforts against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィンタースケール閣下は、エクスパンスの利益を守るよりも己の頑固さを示す方が重要だと判断していた。愚かさほど厄介なものは無い。だが情報筋によれば、反抗しながらも異種族に抵抗するレジスタンスに加わったそうだ。奴への認可は保留することにした…当面はな」

languages.text: « Sa Seigneurie a trouvé plus important d'afficher son entêtement que de protéger les intérêts des Étendues. Une stupidité particulièrement pénible. Cependant, j'ai appris qu'il avait tout de même rejoint ma croisade contre les xénos, c'est pourquoi j'ai décidé de ne pas le sanctionner... pour l'instant. »
languages.original_text: "His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined my efforts against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

traits.locale_text: « Sa Seigneurie a trouvé plus important d'afficher son entêtement que de protéger les intérêts des Étendues. Une stupidité particulièrement pénible. Cependant, j'ai appris qu'il avait tout de même rejoint la résistance contre les xénos, c'est pourquoi j'ai décidé de ne pas le sanctionner... pour l'instant. »

languages.text: "Seine Lordschaft hielt es für wichtiger, seine Sturheit zu demonstrieren, als die Interessen der Ausdehnung zu wahren. Dummheit von der beschwerlichsten Art. Aber meine Quellen sagen, dass er sich trotzdem meinem Kampf gegen die Xenos angeschlossen hat, und deshalb sehe ich von Sanktionen ab ... vorerst."
languages.original_text: "His Lordship deemed it more important to show off his stubbornness than to safeguard the interests of the Expanse. Stupidity of the most burdensome kind. But my sources inform me that he nevertheless has joined my efforts against the xenos, and so I have decided to stay any sanctions... for a time."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Lordschaft hielt es für wichtiger, seine Sturheit zu demonstrieren, als die Interessen der Ausdehnung zu wahren. Dummheit von der beschwerlichsten Art. Aber meine Quellen sagen, dass er sich trotzdem dem Widerstand gegen die Xenos angeschlossen hat, und deshalb sehe ich von Sanktionen ab ... vorerst."
